author: mbenson
msg: use asm commons to drastically shrink code; eliminate Unsafe class that relies on Sun/Oracle private APIs; incidentally fix a bug where caught exceptions had to match declared type exactly, with no notion of inheritance, to be correctly rethrown

author: claude
msg: Added code to convert internal variables to arguments to keep the stack in sync.
